title: Wave 1-Shipment 2 release date?
body:
I searched the boards but I haven't found any information on when shipment 2 will start shipping. I ordered my copy the friday release date at about midnight (with the cut off for shipment 1 being 8pm it seems) and was just wondering when that will start shipping.

  I know I am very excited as well as my board game group to play the game. :)

replies.body: i ordered it on december 5th and got my invoice does that mean im definately on wave 2
I actually got it yesterday so I was excited
Yup, Wave 2 is shipping this week! Expect to get your copies this week and next if you are in NA or EU. Other regions may take a bit longer!
Hey, we don't have a definitive date yet, but expect Wave 1 Shipment 2 to ship out around mid december.
Hi! Does this shipment include errata-ed cards? Or do we need to wait for wave 2 for that? :)
Hey, does it mean it will be delivered before Christmas? (Shipping to London, UK) Thanks for letting me know, I'm too excited - been checking website every single day for the last 2 weeks..
